"Hrm...": "Kohri, why are you down in the dumps? Did something happen?"
"Hitsugi... is it true that you've received a love letter?"
"Agh, how do you know about that?!"
"Love letter? You mean the letter she found in her shoe locker this morning?"
"Aru, you little..."
"This is bad, Hitsugi! As the head of the student council, you can't afford to be receiving something like that! You have to set an example!"
"That's workplace fraternization! If you get caught by the paparazzi and end up on the front page, it'll be a PR nightmare!"
"I don't care! It's not like I asked to get one, I just did!"
"So, let's burn it. Immediately. Kay?"
"You're scaring me!"
"Fine, but we should still teach the sender a little lesson. I'll go give him a stern warning."
"Hey! Don't pull out Gram! Cut it out, Kohri!"
"Hey, thought I'd drop by."
"Oh, big brother!"
"Hey, Aru. It's been a while. Have you been doing alright?"
"Yeah!"
"What's up, Enga? Did you have something for the student council?"
"Nah, I heard about you having some sort of affair with a love letter or something."
"You too, Enga?! Wait, it was you, wasn't it Kohri!"
"Teehee."
"Alright, well, bring him here, Hitsugi. As your brother, I want to make sure he's a good fit for you."
"Ah, give me a break! I don't even know who sent it! There was no name written on it or anything."
"He forgot to write his name? What an idiot. Try doing that on a test; you'd get 0 marks. Zero!"
"None of that matters right now! Hitsugi, what sort of things were written in the love letter?!"
"Oof... Actually, it's kind of embarrassing..."
"\"Thank you for everything. I love you, sis. Let's always be together.\""
"Eh?! Aru, how did you know--"
"Ahhh, it has \"sis\" written in it... No way!"
"Sis, I'm sorry. I forgot to write my name on it."
"Ahhh! Thank goodness, oh thank goodness!"
"Hitsugi, Aru! Let's all live happy lives together, okay!"
"What the hell's going on?!"
"To think Hitsugi got a love letter from Aru. He's just so adorable!"
"Well it wasn't really a love letter... more like a thank-you letter. It's a good thing it wasn't decorated or anything."
"It seems Earth is gonna be just fine. It's the very picture of peace!"
